column1: '''Dry Creek Quarry''' is a quarry outside [[Wellington]]
column3: owned by Allied Concrete. It formed the set of the [[Hornburg]] in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]. It was not destroyed; rather
column4: it was rebuilt as a maze version of [[Minas Tirith]]
column5: to be used on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]].
